tcf.executePathMapper.description: Execute path mapper function, if defined in launch configuration.

record.description: File path where TCF messages will be recorded into

playback.description: File path with recorded TCF message which will be used to replay TCF messages (host and port will be ignored)

debugTCFMessages.description: Show TCF messages in the debug console

pathMapper.description: A Javascript function to map a local path to the debugger path

file.description: The Make file that provides the task. Can be omitted.
